languages.text: "Еще я видел недавно ту девчонку, {d|Encyclopedia:CQ_LizzyOnBoardDecision}Мейв{/d}... Делает реверансы перед каждым встречным, улыбка до ушей. Раздражает страшно, но она определенно безобидна. Распознавать, кто не несет угрозу, и находить ему применение — тоже ценная способность".

traits.locale_text: "Еще я видел недавно ту девчонку, Мейв... Делает реверансы перед каждым встречным, улыбка до ушей. Раздражает страшно, но она определенно безобидна. {d|Encyclopedia:CQ_LizzyOnBoardDecision}Распознавать, кто не несет угрозу, и находить ему применение{/d} — тоже ценная способность".

languages.text: "By the way, I ran into that young woman recently, {d|Encyclopedia:CQ_LizzyOnBoardDecision}Maive{/d}. Curtsies to anyone she meets, big smile on her face. I cannot express how much she irritates me, but she is definitely harmless. It is a valuable talent to know when someone poses no threat and can be put to good use."

Раздражает страшно, но она определенно безобидна. Распознавать, кто не несет угрозу, и находить ему применение — тоже ценная способность".

languages.text: 「ところで、最近あの若い女性、{d|Encyclopedia:CQ_LizzyOnBoardDecision}メイヴ{/d}に会いましたよ。誰にでもお辞儀をして、顔には満面の笑みを浮かべていました。正直、あれほど癪に障る相手もいませんが、害のない存在であることは間違いありません。誰かが脅威でないと見極め、有効に活用できるというのは、貴重な才能ですよ」
languages.original_text: "By the way, I ran into that young woman recently, {d|Encyclopedia:CQ_LizzyOnBoardDecision}Maive{/d}. Curtsies to anyone she meets, big smile on her face. I cannot express how much she irritates me, but she is definitely harmless. It is a valuable talent to know when someone poses no threat and can be put to good use."

traits.locale_text: 「ところで、最近あの若い女性、メイヴに会いましたよ。誰にでもお辞儀をして、顔には満面の笑みを浮かべていました。正直、あれほど癪に障る相手もいませんが、害のない存在であることは間違いありません。誰かが脅威でないと見極め、有効に活用できるというのは、貴重な才能ですよ」
「ところで、最近あの若い女性、メイヴに会いましたよ。誰にでもお辞儀をして、顔には満面の笑みを浮かべていました。正直、あれほど癪に障る相手もいませんが、害のない存在であることは間違いありません。誰かが脅威でないと見極め、有効に活用できるというのは、貴重な才能ですよ」

languages.text: "Ich bin übrigens kürzlich dieser jungen Frau begegnet, {d|Encyclopedia:CQ_LizzyOnBoardDecision}Maive{/d}. Sie macht einen Knicks vor allen, denen sie begegnet, und hat ein breites Lächeln im Gesicht. Ich kann gar nicht sagen, wie sehr sie mich irritiert, aber sie ist definitiv harmlos. Es ist eine wertvolle Gabe, zu erkennen, wenn jemand keine Bedrohung darstellt und nützlich eingesetzt werden kann."
languages.original_text: "By the way, I ran into that young woman recently, {d|Encyclopedia:CQ_LizzyOnBoardDecision}Maive{/d}. Curtsies to anyone she meets, big smile on her face. I cannot express how much she irritates me, but she is definitely harmless. It is a valuable talent to know when someone poses no threat and can be put to good use."

Es ist eine wertvolle Gabe, zu erkennen, wenn jemand keine Bedrohung darstellt und nützlich eingesetzt werden kann."

Ich kann gar nicht sagen, wie sehr sie mich irritiert, aber sie ist definitiv harmlos. Es ist eine wertvolle Gabe, zu erkennen, wenn jemand keine Bedrohung darstellt und nützlich eingesetzt werden kann."

languages.text: « À propos, j'ai récemment croisé cette jeune femme, {d|Encyclopedia:CQ_LizzyOnBoardDecision}Maive{/d}. Elle était rayonnante, s'inclinait devant toutes les personnes qu'elle croisait. Je dois admettre qu'elle m'irrite au plus haut point, mais elle semble tout à fait inoffensive. C'est un véritable talent que de savoir distinguer et mettre à contribution les personnes qui ne représentent absolument aucune menace pour nous. »
languages.original_text: "By the way, I ran into that young woman recently, {d|Encyclopedia:CQ_LizzyOnBoardDecision}Maive{/d}. Curtsies to anyone she meets, big smile on her face. I cannot express how much she irritates me, but she is definitely harmless. It is a valuable talent to know when someone poses no threat and can be put to good use."

traits.locale_text: « À propos, j'ai récemment croisé cette jeune femme, Maive. Elle était rayonnante, s'inclinait devant toutes les personnes qu'elle croisait. Je dois admettre qu'elle m'irrite au plus haut point, mais elle semble tout à fait inoffensive. C'est un véritable talent que de savoir distinguer et mettre à contribution les personnes qui ne représentent absolument aucune menace pour nous. »

« À propos, j'ai récemment croisé cette jeune femme, Maive. Elle était rayonnante, s'inclinait devant toutes les personnes qu'elle croisait. Je dois admettre qu'elle m'irrite au plus haut point, mais elle semble tout à fait inoffensive. C'est un véritable talent que de savoir distinguer et mettre à contribution les personnes qui ne représentent absolument aucune menace pour nous. »

languages.text: «Por cierto, hace poco me topé con esa muchacha, {d|Encyclopedia:CQ_LizzyOnBoardDecision}Maive{/d}. Se pasea por ahí haciendo reverencias a todo el mundo con una sonrisa enorme en la cara. No tengo palabras para explicarle cuánto me irrita, pero es inofensiva. Considero un talento muy valioso el saber cuándo alguien no supone una amenaza y se le puede dar buen uso».
languages.original_text: "By the way, I ran into that young woman recently, {d|Encyclopedia:CQ_LizzyOnBoardDecision}Maive{/d}. Curtsies to anyone she meets, big smile on her face. I cannot express how much she irritates me, but she is definitely harmless. It is a valuable talent to know when someone poses no threat and can be put to good use."

No tengo palabras para explicarle cuánto me irrita, pero es inofensiva. Considero un talento muy valioso el saber cuándo alguien no supone una amenaza y se le puede dar buen uso».

«Por cierto, hace poco me topé con esa muchacha, Maive. Se pasea por ahí haciendo reverencias a todo el mundo con una sonrisa enorme en la cara. No tengo palabras para explicarle cuánto me irrita, pero es inofensiva. Considero un talento muy valioso el saber cuándo alguien no supone una amenaza y se le puede dar buen uso».

languages.text: “顺便说一句，我最近又遇到了那个叫做{d|Encyclopedia:CQ_LizzyOnBoardDecision}梅芙{/d}的年轻女人。她无论见到谁都会行屈膝礼，脸上始终挂着灿烂的笑容。我很难用语言形容她这个样子会让我有多恼火，但她绝对不会伤害任何人。你很了解哪些人不会构成威胁，哪些人可以善加利用，这是宝贵的才能。”
languages.original_text: "By the way, I ran into that young woman recently, {d|Encyclopedia:CQ_LizzyOnBoardDecision}Maive{/d}. Curtsies to anyone she meets, big smile on her face. I cannot express how much she irritates me, but she is definitely harmless. It is a valuable talent to know when someone poses no threat and can be put to good use."

traits.locale_text: “顺便说一句，我最近又遇到了那个叫做梅芙的年轻女人。她无论见到谁都会行屈膝礼，脸上始终挂着灿烂的笑容。我很难用语言形容她这个样子会让我有多恼火，但她绝对不会伤害任何人。你很了解哪些人不会构成威胁，哪些人可以善加利用，这是宝贵的才能。”
“顺便说一句，我最近又遇到了那个叫做梅芙的年轻女人。她无论见到谁都会行屈膝礼，脸上始终挂着灿烂的笑容。我很难用语言形容她这个样子会让我有多恼火，但她绝对不会伤害任何人。你很了解哪些人不会构成威胁，哪些人可以善加利用，这是宝贵的才能。”

languages.text: "Bu arada... {d|Encyclopedia:CQ_LizzyOnBoardDecision}Maive{/d} denen genç kadına denk geldim. Kiminle karşılaşsa yüzünde kocaman bir gülümsemeyle reverans yapıyor. Beni ne kadar sinirlendirdiğini kelimelerle anlatamam ama kendisi bir karıncayı bile incitmez. Bir kişinin tehdit teşkil etmeyeceğini ve kendisinden iyi bir şekilde yararlanılabileceğini bilmek değerli bir yetenek."
languages.original_text: "By the way, I ran into that young woman recently, {d|Encyclopedia:CQ_LizzyOnBoardDecision}Maive{/d}. Curtsies to anyone she meets, big smile on her face. I cannot express how much she irritates me, but she is definitely harmless. It is a valuable talent to know when someone poses no threat and can be put to good use."

traits.locale_text: "Bu arada, geçenlerde o genç kadına denk geldim. Maive ile. Kiminle karşılaşsa yüzünde kocaman bir gülümsemeyle reverans yapıyor. Beni ne kadar sinirlendirdiğini kelimelerle anlatamam ama kendisi bir karıncayı bile incitmez. Bir kişinin tehdit teşkil etmeyeceğini ve kendisinden iyi bir şekilde yararlanılabileceğini bilmek değerli bir yetenek."

Beni ne kadar sinirlendirdiğini kelimelerle anlatamam ama kendisi bir karıncayı bile incitmez. Bir kişinin tehdit teşkil etmeyeceğini ve kendisinden iyi bir şekilde yararlanılabileceğini bilmek değerli bir yetenek."
